programme.title: Journeys From the Centre of the Earth
programme.desc: Tracing the history of cave paintings.

programme.title: Journeys From the Centre of the Earth
programme.desc: Dr Iain Stewart examines how the rocks beneath our feet played a crucial role in determining the beliefs of ancient civilisations.

programme.title: Journeys From the Centre of the Earth
programme.desc: Dr Iain Stewart looks at how ancient civilisations learned to exploit the water around them, from the flooding of our Stone Age ancestors' hunting grounds to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Journeys From the Centre of the Earth
programme.desc: Dr Iain Stewart looks at how salt has played a crucial role in the history of the Mediterranean, from the ice ages to the preservation of food and dead bodies in ancient Egypt.

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: The world's biggest beasts have always captured the imagination, but whilst being big can have its advantages, it also comes with sizeable challenges. The Komodo dragon's huge appetite means it must take on prey ten times its weight.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The life of the first reptilian carnivores on Earth, told through computer animation.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: The Jurassic period saw the advent of the largest and strongest dinosaurs that ever roamed the Earth.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: A look at the world as it was 149 million years ago - in the late Jurassic Period. The old continents have broken up and much of the land is under water. Huge shallow seas have supported a revolution in marine life.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: With wings longer than those of a small plane, pterosaurs were the largest creatures ever known to have flown.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: This programme looks at the Cretaceous period, 106 million years ago. Volcanic activity forces the continents apart, and dinosaurs diversify into a range of species to cope with environmental extremes.

programme.title: Walking with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: It is the late Cretaceous period and Tyrannosaurus rex is the top predator, but the Earth is poisoned by volcanic activity and a comet strikes.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: It is only in recent years that experts have unearthed the biggest dinosaurs that ever lived. One monster eclipsed all others, more than seven times as heavy as diplodocus was the immense argentinosaurus.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: A new generation of carnivores was about to take killing to the next level. At the end of the Cretaceous period, these new hunter killers had spread throughout the globe.

programme.title: Planet Dinosaur
programme.desc: A look at bizarre dinosaurs such as the curious buck-toothed Exipdexipteryx, the amazing four-winged Microraptor and the pot-bellied Nothronychus.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: In 2000, scientists made a groundbreaking discovery, explaining how birds evolved from dinosaurs. However, a deeper investigation put a question mark over everything.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: Exploring a dinosaur graveyard in Patagonia to gain a better understanding of dinosaur evolution, particularly the Middle Jurassic period when they became gigantic.

programme.title: Living with Dinosaurs
programme.desc: David Attenborough learns that descendants of the dinosaur age are alive and well. David explores how they survived the catastrophes that wiped out other species.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Horror of Fang Rock
programme.desc: A thick fog surrounds Fang Rock as an alien menace stalks the island.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Horror of Fang Rock
programme.desc: The survivors are in the lighthouse, but the Doctor is still worried about the creature.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Horror of Fang Rock
programme.desc: The alien Rutan begins to pick off the remaining humans one by one.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Destiny Of The Daleks
programme.desc: The Doctor and Romana arrive on a desolate planet, but soon find that they aren't alone.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Destiny Of The Daleks
programme.desc: The Movellans try to discover the purpose of the Daleks.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Destiny Of The Daleks
programme.desc: The Doctor and Romana are trapped underground and the Daleks are moving in for the kill.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Destiny Of The Daleks
programme.desc: In their plan to defeat the Daleks, The Doctor and Romana face a terrible quandary.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Invasion of Time
programme.desc: The Doctor returns to Gallifrey to claim his position as President of the Time Lords.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Invasion of Time
programme.desc: The Doctor orders K9 to lower the Gallifrey's defences.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Invasion of Time
programme.desc: The Doctor is accused of betrayal when the Vardans invade Gallifrey.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Invasion of Time
programme.desc: As the Vardans materialise on Gallifrey, the Doctor prepares to spring his trap.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Invasion of Time
programme.desc: The Sontarans attempt to take full control of Gallifrey.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Invasion of Time
programme.desc: A dangerous game of hide and seek begins inside the TARDIS when the Sontarans get in.

programme.title: Doctor Who: City of Death
programme.desc: While on holiday in Paris, the Doctor and Romana experience time distortion.

programme.title: Doctor Who: City of Death
programme.desc: Scarlioni is planning to steal the Mona Lisa. Yet he has six in his cellar - all genuine.

programme.title: Doctor Who: City of Death
programme.desc: Count Scarlioni is really Scaroth, last of the Jagaroth.

programme.title: Doctor Who: City of Death
programme.desc: Scaroth intends to travel back in time to save his own people from destruction.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Shada
programme.desc: Chris Parsons is happily engrossed in studying post-graduate physics at Cambridge, when one day he finds an old book, sitting on a dusty shelf in an ageing professor's library.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Logopolis
programme.desc: To repair the TARDIS's chameleon circuit, the Doctor goes to Earth for a real police box.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Logopolis
programme.desc: The Doctor travels to Logopolis where a series of fateful events are set in motion.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Logopolis
programme.desc: The Master is loose on Logopolis and is determined to learn the planet's secret.

programme.title: Doctor Who: Logopolis
programme.desc: With the fate of the universe at stake, the Doctor and the Master must collaborate.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar tries to help bring peace to Jennifer Lee Pryor's home, where fights have been breaking out among foster dogs and her own four dogs; an aggressive beagle.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Yorkshire terrier who became aggressive after going blind; a spoiled Pekingese/miniature poodle mix; a Rottweiler with a dangerous obsession with the horses on the ranch where she lives.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps a disrespectful yellow Lab who causes chaos everywhere she goes and some dogs who are misbehaving at the office.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A French bulldog fails the doggy day-care entrance exam; three Jack Russell terriers fight one another for their owner's attention; a beagle howls incessantly while on walks.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A mail carrier learns to thwart dog attacks; two Pomeranians attack each other when left alone; a Swiss mountain dog is aggressive around food.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A miniature schnauzer compulsively spins in circles; four French bulldogs do not listen to their owner; a mixed breed has a leash tied so tightly it has to be surgically removed.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar Milan is called in to help singer Patti LaBelle who is afraid of her own guard dog and a teacher who wants to unify her dog's dual personalities.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A ridgeback mix has eccentricities; a Jack Russell terrier attacks motorcycles; a border collie's herding instincts get the best of him.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An Australian shepherd is too dedicated to its owner; a beagle mix lashes out at anyone who walks past; an Italian mastiff fears cars.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A puppy terrorizes its owner's cat; a spoiled Yorkshire terrier; a Rottweiler is aggressive toward strangers.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An Italian greyhound mix is possessive over bones and toys; a mastiff misbehaves outside; a Yorkshire terrier takes over her owner's morning routine.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An unpredictably aggressive Kerry blue terrier; two territorial Maltese dogs who are close to being banned from the retirement home where they live; a bloodhound/Catahoula mix who attacks her canine companion.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar visits Tijuana, Mexico, to team up with volunteers from United Hope for Animals, an organization that rescues dogs and finds them U.S. homes; a cocker spaniel taunts her owner.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A golden retriever mix with canine aggression; a bearded collie who barks, howls and scratches at her owner's boyfriend's guitar; a Lhasa apso/Cavalier Kind Charles Spaniel with canine aggression.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Cecily has graduated from High School, and Dog believes the time is right to show her what the family business is all about. The rough and tumble world of bounty hunting is very different from the all-girls private school she attended.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: This one is close to home. Dog's target on today's hunt is the cousin of Kali, Garry Boy's caregiver. In addition, she has a reputation as a brawler. With Duane Lee still missing from the team, Baby Lyssa decides she will step up in this hunt.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: In an attempt to bring the team back together, Dog recruits his pastor, Tim Storey, to be the peacemaker. As Dog begins his hunt for a young man who has trouble showing up at court, Tim has his own mission--convince Duane Lee to meet with him.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: With Duane Lee back on the team, the rift in the Chapman clan appears over. But will time heal this wound? As the family heads out for the seedier side of Honolulu in search of an erotic dancer, we will find out if the wound is truly healed.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When can a bounty hunt also be a date? When Dog and Beth decide to ride in the same SUV as they pursue a runaway fugitive, will their different approaches to the investigation lead to a capture and romance?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: When an alleged abuser goes on, the lame Dog gathers the team to bring him in. As the leads grow colder, Dog's determination only grows stronger. Finally, a hot lead comes in and Dog sets the trap for his prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows, only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: This fugitive spells trouble for Dog in today's hunt. When the leads grow cold, it's the US Postal Service to the rescue as a mail carrier lends a helping hand. Dog's team surrounds the suspected safe house and silently awaits their prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Today's case involves a Samoan, so Dog knows that the runner's close-knit kinfolk holds the keys to bringing him in. Dog's plan is to convince the family that everyone is best served if the fugitive mans up and takes care of business.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog's target for today was once an upstanding member of his community. Now with no home, no job, and the law on his trail, this middle-aged exile from middle-class society is using the cold end of an ice pipe to soothe his troubled soul.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: New series focusing on the tumultuous home and professional life of bounty hunter Dwayne "Dog" Chapman, and his partner and wife Beth. In the first episode, Dog and team chase Floyd Chapman (no relation), a heavily tattooed bail jumper.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: In Hawaii, Dog sets off from Honolulu to Kona to help his son Leland with some of his fugitives. First, a stop at Leland's boxing gym to warm up for their day of hunting with a quick sparring session and some father-and-son time together.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides to liven things up with a competition. He and Beth will hunt for one fugitive, while Leland and Justin chase another. The winner will be the duo that captures its fugitive first. Will Dog keep bragging rights as the Best Bounty Hunter in

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Once a criminal himself, Dog knows how it feels to be hunted. In this episode, Dog and the team delve into the depths of Honolulu's Chinatown as they search for a young Samoan girl who's gone down the wrong path. After a frustrating day of hunting, D

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: While hunting an elusive deep sea fisherman, Dog is also trying to plan a great Mother's Day for Beth, but he's having problems finding the special flowers Beth wants.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog is hunting a man known as The Godfather of Waikiki. Dog and Beth bailed him out as a courtesy, but now he is refusing to go to court. If Dog doesn't bring him in, it could cost him more than money; he may lose his respect on the street.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog has a big problem. Patty Estabilio has jumped a $15,000 bail bond and disappeared into Hawaii's underworld. Kissing the kids good night, Dog and Beth, with Tim and Leland at their side, plunge into a drug-infused netherworld.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Justin is the low man on the totem pole in the Chapman clan, and this means that the rest of the team is always teasing him. But Justin wants to be a full-fledged member of the team, and Dog has a fugitive that will be his test case.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog and his team return to their roots, with a visit to their home town of Denver. Dog and Tim begin the day with an early morning radio show appearance, and it pays off when a listener calls in with a tip about one of the fugitives they're hunting.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Back in Denver Dog discovers that recapturing the past can be more difficult then tracking down felons. On a day of more misses then hits in their fugitive hunting, Dog and Beth repeatedly collide with reminders of their early days.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog hunts down Chris, a fugitive wanted on drug charges. Dog turns over every rock, but to no avail. Later, they decides to revoke the bonds they holds on Chris's mother and stepfather because they've violated the conditions of their own bonds.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog goes after Virginia, a hard-to-find lawbreaker. He gets a tip that a pickup truck will be going to Virginia's house. In true private-eye fashion, the team tails the truck in two SUVs, regularly switching the follow car to throw off their scent.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: Dog decides to sweep the island clean of as many fugitives as he can in two days. Raymond, wanted on drug charges, is an easy grab. Mauro, wanted for solicitation, is busted. And a Samoan, Siamau, is convinced to fly back to Hawaii from L.A.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Kirby learns the truth behind her father's suicide; Krystle tells a stunned Alexis of her pregnancy; Fallon and Jeff announce they will remarry. Blake is planning to attack a nation involved in the China Seas Deal.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake travels to Hong Kong to patch up the China Seas oil deal and learns Ahmed has left the country; Mark blackmails Alexis for $100,000, and McVane watches as he deposits the check; Kirby attempts to kill Alexis but is unsuccessful.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Alexis thwarts Blake's loan extension; Sammy Jo arrives in Denver to see her son; after quarreling with Alexis, Mark is found dead after a fall from her balcony.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake mortgages the mansion to raise money; Tracy tells Alexis of her affair with Dex; Alexis is questioned about Mark's death; Sammy Jo intends to obtain custody of her son; an unknown woman, full of curiosity about Alexis, checks into La Mirage.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Kirby's attempt to kill Alexis is unsuccessful, and Alexis promises to remain silent if Kirby will leave Adam; Sammy Jo reveals the culprit behind Claudia's mystery calls; Fallon is gripped with a seizure and drives off as her wedding is about to begin.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Following a serious traffic accident, Fallon mysteriously vanishes. Dex and Steven bail Alexis out of jail. Sammy Jo attempts to seduce Adam. Alexis flatters Adam by suggesting he work with her defense attorney, Warren Ballard.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Steven accuses Adam of conspiring with Sammy Jo to kidnap Danny. Blake arranges to take out a mortgage on the mansion. He little suspects Alexis has signed the note and will become the owner if he defaults.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: To secure financing for his bankrupt company, Blake arranges to see Billy Waite, a notoriously underhanded oil man. Jeff continues his search for Fallon. Impatient with the progress her lawyer is making on her defense, Alexis fires Warren Ballard.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: In Seattle, Jeff and Blake learn the woman who died in the plane crash with Peter DeVilbis cannot be positively identified, but the ring she was wearing is indeed Fallon's wedding band. Back in Denver, Fallon's moving funeral is held.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake visits Dominique at La Mirage to discuss her recent revelation. She tells Blake that her mother was a long-time mistress of his father and has evidence to prove it. At Alexis' trial, a neighbor offers powerful evidence that incriminates Alexis.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: On the witness stand, Steven testified he saw Alexis push Mark to his death. Jeff sees other women in an attempt to forget Fallon but remains obsessed with his ex-wife. Alexis takes the stand and testifies.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Adam and Dex vow to prove Alexis' innocence and begin a determined campaign. The woman who testified she had seen Alexis on the terrace with Mark had hosted a party that evening and snapped photographs.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Amanda insists Alexis acknowledge their relationship and begs her to reveal her father's identity. Alexis tells her it was simply an anonymous ski instructor in Gstaad. Steven and Alexis reconcile.

programme.title: Dynasty
programme.desc: Blake offers to help Amanda find her father. Claudia goes out with Dean to dinner, while Steven rejects Luke. Jeff ends up sleeping with Nicole. Dominique goes to Istanbul to meet with Rashid Ahmed.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants must leap back and forth from the boats to get as many flags. Contestant is put into a vat used for stomping on grapes to make wine. Contestant must walk the length of the truck removing flags along the way.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: The contestant must slide down two cables while standing on a small platform. One at a time, contestants pick gifts from under a Christmas tree. Contestants must swim underneath a 20 foot by 40-foot Plexiglas grid that is lit on fire.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestants will be placed on a platform floating in the water, where they will grab a skid of the helicopter. Player is chained between two poles and covered with bees. Contestants will be seated in the front of a car suspended over the water.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will be contected to a dune buggy by his ankles. Contestant will have to bury their spouse's head in worms using only their mouth. One person from each team will be hanging from the skids of a helicopter.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will be chained to either side of a platform with the contestant having one key to free them from chains. Player dunks their head into a tank and retrieves a cows heart with their mouth.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: In this couples stunt, partners will hang by their ankles, they will each hold onto one end of a rope and be lifted over the water. Couples will use their mouths to root around in pies made from wax worms, pigs stomach, fish sauce and duck tongue.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Player A is placed on a dunk tank. In the tank is a mixture of cow parts floating in water. One member of the team will be suspended by their ankles underneath a helicopter.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: In this stunt, the female contestant will be placed in a cage that is hung from a helicopter and is approx. 20 feet in the air. A dumpster filled with disgusting garbage is placed at one end of an alley.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will be standing on a beam that is suspended high in the air. Player is placed in a coffin with 100 chicken feet and is then covered in rats. Couples stunt one of the team members is hog tied by four ropes and suspended.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Two contestants are seated in the front of a car. The driver is blind folded and the passenger must navigate for them. Player is strapped down in a coffin and then covered with 500 Tarantulas.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant will exit a helicopter and release a flag. They will be standing on platforms suspended in the air. Contestant must chew through the cow intestine. Contestants will ride a mini motorcycle across a beam that is suspended from a crane.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: Contestant must get on a pole directly out, under the nose of a helicopter. Players will bob in cheese and then eat grasshoppers. Contestants are hung upside down into a Plexiglas tank filled with Eels. Contestants must drive up with only two wheels.

programme.title: Fear Factor
programme.desc: The contestant will be put in a clear plex-glass tube that will be lifted up and placed just above the water. Snakes and lizards will be dumped in the box. Contestant will be standing on a plexi-glass incline pirtched on top of a roof in the air.

programme.title: Pescado desconocido

programme.title: Pescado desconocido

programme.title: Pescado desconocido

programme.title: Pescado desconocido

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A surgeon is stabbed to death and the most likely suspect is seen in a restaurant at the time of the murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When police recovered the submerged car of a missing man, they expected to find his body — but it wasn't there. The investigation that followed would uncover an obsession turned deadly.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators find a shoe print, several foreign hairs and unknown fingerprints at a murder scene. But they believe the most telling piece of evidence is the bite mark on the victim's chest.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A married couple decided to escape the cold of winter with a mini-vacation in Key West. The wife went missing and police searched every square inch of the island; they found nothing but a pair of sandals which might have belonged to her.

programme.title: Forensic Files: Order Up
programme.desc: A man is found dead in his home and his ex-wife has a perfect alibi. To determine time of death, investigators need to know when the victim ate his last meal. An endocrinologist, a forensic botanist and a short-order cook answer their question.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On a cold December night in 1993, Rose Larner stopped in a convenience store on her way to her boyfriend's house. She was never seen or heard from again. Rose's disappearance remained a mystery, until a tiny clue is found years later.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: California police had several suspects in the robbery and brutal murder of an elderly couple. Ten years later, a determined forensic scientist used material from a dentist's office to uncover ballistic evidence that had been overlooked.

programme.title: Forensic Files: Over and Out
programme.desc: When a pipe bomb rips through a rural home, police have no idea who is responsible. A 9-volt battery and the remnants of a mailing label ead investigators to the man who made the bomb.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1962, the small town residents of Hanford, California lost their sense of peace when one of their own, 15-year-old Marlene Miller, was murdered.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The 1996 investigation into 48-year-old Martha Hansen's murder is helped by a legal requirement that bars have video cameras installed on the premises.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: At the scene of a vicious murder, the killer went to a great deal of effort to wipe away his fingerprints and obscure his shoe impressions left when he tracked blood trails on the floor.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In a 1992 murder case, the autopsy of a cremated body turns up telltale clues of foul play.

programme.title: Forensic Files: Past Lives
programme.desc: The body of a wealthy American businessman was found in his rental car. Teeth and bone fragments were the only remains. When the victim's wife files an insurance claim for $7 million, investigators seek the help of a renowned forensic anthropologist.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1981, New York correctional officer Donna Payant disappeared and was later found in a landfill. The medical examiner not only identified the cause of death, but also found an important clue.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Three seemingly unrelated deaths prove to be serial murders. The killer had been careful; he used poison which had no taste or odor. Fortunately for investigators, it also had a unique chemical signature.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1995, Palm Beach waitress Denise O'Neill is abducted and murdered. Her neighbor Luis Caballero arouses suspicions by behaving oddly toward TV crews covering the crime.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Professional photographer Charles Rathbun claims model Linda Sobek died during a consensual sexual encounter gone wrong, but Sobek's corpse and digital imaging tell a more sinister story.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Modesto, California teenager goes missing. With no signs of struggle in her home, police suspect she has simply run away — until her naked, bruised body is discovered in a ditch 20 miles away.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After a street fight takes the life of a national wrestling champion, police must determine if he was killed in cold blood or in self-defense.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: One morning in a deserted area outside of Phoenix, a motorcyclist discovers the body of a young woman. She had been beaten, bound, strangled and possibly raped. Nearby plants tell investigators more about the killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman convicted of killing her mother in a car fire is granted a new trial. An expert witness has a different opinion as to how the fire started and, if proven, would clear the woman of any culpability.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A man riding a bicycle was fatally injured in what police believed to be a hit-and-run accident. Tiny clues found at the scene created a picture of the vehicle which struck him and led police to its driver.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1984, California firefighters battled ten arson fires in three weeks. When cigarettes and a scrap of paper connected the case to similar fires further north, the hunt was on for a dangerous pyromaniac.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 2006, Nevada politician Kathy Augustine died mysteriously during a re-election campaign. The medical examiner could neither isolate the cause of death, nor explain the tiny puncture wounds discovered during the autopsy.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: On October 15, 1985, two bomb explosions rocked Salt Lake City and resulted in two deaths. A third explosion occurred the next day; this time, the victim survived.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Several suspects and conflicting evidence complicated a brutal murder investigation. But the forensics were clear on one thing: the killer knew his victim, and that alone gave investigators a head start.

programme.title: Un vistazo al amor
programme.desc: Una joven pierde la esperanza de casarse cuando su prometido termina su relación con ella. Regresando en tren a casa, intercambia miradas con un apuesto extraño que le deja su teléfono al terminar el viaje.

programme.title: Amor en verano
programme.desc: Maya Sulliway es una madre soltera que está estudiando para ser Contadora. Cuando su hija se va a un campamento de verano, Maya acepta una posición como pasante en una empresa de tecnología para adquirir créditos universitarios.

programme.title: Reencontrando el amor
programme.desc: Cuando el matrimonio de Jennie e Ian se vuelve monótono después de quince años, Jennie insiste en que tenga una cita a ciegas… con ella. Redescubriéndose como si se tratara de personas que apenas se conocían, tendrán una segunda oportunidad.

programme.title: Manual del romance
programme.desc: Una mujer cambia su personalidad de acuerdo con un libro de citas para encontrar un esposo, pero se da cuenta de que el hombre que quiere es el que la ama por lo que es.

programme.title: Amor en tierra
programme.desc: Cuando Jenna, una escritora y madre soltera, planea un viaje a la costa con sus hijos para sus vacaciones de verano, nunca espera compartir su vivienda con un surfista despreocupado.

programme.title: Un vistazo al amor

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: The joyous visit by everyone's favorite, Grandma Cora, turns to gloom when she gets mugged in the park, but Mork turns the dastardly deed into a hilarious caper when he and Grandma join forces to even the score.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mork, who doesn't understand why people gossip, reveals some hilarious inside scoops when he shows and tells all about his friends while subbing for Mindy as host of a local TV show called Rumor Has It.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: When Mindy has to work long hours on a new TV call-in show, Mork has to help with the housework. But when his comedic cleaning efforts turn the apartment into a disaster area, he calls up Mindy, on the air, for a new set of instructions.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mr. Bickley's 50th birthday celebration turns into a crazy exchange of everybody's deepest secrets, but Mindy waits until the group leaves to tell Mork somthing she's wanted to say for years.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: TV game show "Be Silly for Dollars" comes to Milwaukee. Len, Squig, and the girls are chosen as contestants. The boys are happy, winning a salami, but the girls perform zany stunts to win the grand prize from "The World of Luxury".

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Laverne's new man Jake is exciting, but that excitement turns to danger when he forces her to help rob a store. Shaken up, she begs Shirley to help rid her of him. Jake won't have it, but can they get him to surrender to the police?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Shirley takes a night school Medical Assistance class. Laverne joins her too. Professor Wilner makes learning tough for Laverne so she walks out, as he says she's unteachable. Will Shirley help Laverne bone up and pass the class?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: A bully that works with Lenny and Squiggy is always pushing them around. He gets them to set him up with Laverne, but he has only one thing on his mind. Will the guys step aside or stand up to him and save Laverne?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Shirley befriends a German Shepard at the kennel when its abusive owner claims he's a mad dog. Finding out all unadopted and unclaimed dogs are killed, she and Laverne have a sit-in. Can their efforts save him and all the other dogs?

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Frank DeFazio loses some of his Christmas spirit when he has to cancel his yearly gathering for the homeless and poor. The girls and friends step in to help him keep the holiday meaningful for the less fortunate.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: As Shirley goes back for a grocery item, Laverne's at the checkout line, winning a shopping spree. Shirley feels jealous of her, but soon Laverne sees she's forgotten her friend. The two then team up for an all-out 5 minute, Supermarket Sweep.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Shirley and her brother think she's adopted as she doesn't resemble any Feeneys. Later at the hospital where Shirley was born the girls try to get the truth by accessing a private file room in disguise. Is Shirley not a true Feeney female?

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mindy is the beautiful bride and Mork is the outrageously funny groom - who may not be able to fit into his tuxedo if he can't convince Orson to approve the marriage and undo his transformation of Mork into an English sheep dog.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mork and unsuspecting Mindy hatch a comedy plot that's bigger than both of them when an egg emerges from Mork's navel that grows and grows until it bursts open and out pops their full-grown, middle-aged-looking son.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mindy is dazed at the reality that she and Mork are the parents of Mearth -half-earthling/half-orkan with the body of a 50-year-old and the mind of an infant and feels lef t out when Mearth accepts Mork as his mommy.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mork buys Mearth a fortune in presents to assure his happiness, and when Mindy, fearing a spoiled child, orders that they be returned, their unusual child decides they don't love him anymore.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mearth hates his first day of school on planet Ork so much that Mork and Mindy accompany him back to Ork Prep, where Mork's ancient teacher - who looks like a child - is still sternly in charge.

programme.title: Mork & Mindy
programme.desc: Mindy, already worried about losing her job at the television station, foresees disaster when Mork and Mearth accidentally transfer minds, forcing her to take Mearth in Mork’s body to meet the new boss.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Richie, Ralph, and Potsie endure the harassment of "hell week" to prove themselves worthy to enter their college fraternity, Phi Kappa Nu.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Sophomore Joanie Cunningham gets basic back-seat defense tips from Richie and Fonzie before her first "car date" with a senior boy, and then cramps her older brother's style when she and her date show up at his college "make-out" party.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: What begins as a humorous escapade with a motorcycle turns into a tragic vigil for the Cunninghams and their friends.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Fonzie's latest romantic interest, a ballet teacher, is secretly yearning to turn professional and dance with the greats in New York. Fonzie, however, has trouble accepting that she may forgo their relationship to pursue her dreams of fame.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: When Ralph Malph is hypnotized to cure his fright after a tornado warning is posted, Ralph's loss of fear causes him to tempt fate by suggesting that the Fonz needs training wheels for his stupid motorcycle

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: Joanie believes she has to smoke to fit in with the cool girls. She ignores the pleas from her family to stop, until the Fonz defines what cool really means

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: In a poignant, change-of-pace episode titled Fonzie's Blindness, Al barges through the kitchen door at the drive-in and hits Fonzie in the head with a tray of food.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: When Richie is caught two-timing Lori Beth for a pretty baton twirler, the Fonz has to step in and give Richie a few lessons in love.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Laverne shows Lenny a kindness and then gives him a kiss. Lenny now feels he loves her, and she's now his. No one can get through to him that this isn't the case, but Laverne hopes to let him down easy without completely breaking his heart.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Tim decides to enter Lightning Dexter in a claiming race, despite Amy's objections. Amy and Ty's troubles are aggravated when Chase comes to town and offers to put in a bid on Dexter.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Jack resists taking a trip to France with Lisa while dealing with some old memories. Caleb asks Ty to be his best man but finds it harder to ask him to move out.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Amy finds herself overwhelmed after promising to de-sensitize three horses for the local police. Amy returns the last of Ty's things and he continues down his road of confusion.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: When famous Olympic trainer Stewart Forrest hires Amy to coach his Olympic hopeful daughter, Amy feels that he's pushing her and her horse too hard. Ty is concerned when Amy asks Chase for help again.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Bad publicity from Stewart Forrest's lawsuit against Amy has everyone at Heartland concerned. When Chase pulls his horses from training, Ty lends Amy his support and Lou does a little investigating.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Caleb's rodeo buddy Bryce returns from Afghanistan in a wheelchair and asks Amy to get his horse back into good condition so that he can sell it, but Amy would rather convince him to try riding again.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Tim and his girlfriend announce they are selling the ranch and moving to California, but one of Tim's old girlfriends comes back and claims that Tim is the father of her son.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Amy and Ty work through their trust issues as they train a pair of Clydesdales. A horse-crazed boy and his mom show up at Heartland and Tim learns about a son he never knew he had.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Amy meets a professional liberty horse trainer and is inspired to take her horsemanship to a new level. A leaky roof forces Amy and Ty to move into Ashley and Caleb's trailer.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Jack shanghais Tim, taking him to Moosejaw to confront his ex-girlfriend and son. Meanwhile, Amy is left to confront Janice about how to train the new racehorse.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Peter and Lou bring the baby back to Heartland and invite the in-laws to the naming ceremony. Scott drops by Ty's new place with a motorcycle requiring some work.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Amy works with a chuckwagon horse and discovers an impediment that could put the entire team in danger, so she changes the dynamics of a prominent chuckwagon family.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: Amy helps to restore the confidence of a troubled young trick-rider so that she can get back on her horse and perform again.

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc: A friend from Jack's past shows up when one of their old bandmates passes away. Lou and Lisa secretly try to gather the other remaining members for a reunion performance to celebrate Jack's birthday.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día cinco
programme.desc: El quinto día comienza con el chef Ramsay dando una lección a los concursantes restantes sobre el arte del sabor culinario.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día seis
programme.desc: Los seis chefs restantes preparan sus platos originales, y los dos equipos diseñan sus menús para la cena de la noche.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Dia siete
programme.desc: Los chefs deben trabajar como equipo por primera vez. El premio de este desafío es un viaje con el chef Ramsay al Red Rock Casino, Resort and Spa.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día ocho
programme.desc: Con solo cuatro chefs restantes, la competencia se vuelve feroz. ¿Quién de ellos tiene lo que se necesita para ser el jefe de cocina del nuevo restaurante de Gordon Ramsay?

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día nueve
programme.desc: Los concursantes prueban el plato estrella del chef Ramsay y se les dan veinte minutos para reproducirlo. Las tensiones aumentan entre los chefs en medio de acusaciones de trampa.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día diez - Parte 1
programme.desc: Luego de una visita sorpresa de familiares, los concursantes restantes deberán diseñar sus propios restaurantes y jerarquías para el servicio final.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español: Día diez - Parte 2
programme.desc: Desde el menú hasta la decoración, los dos finalistas deben demostrar su talento al chef Ramsay, ya que cada uno está a cargo de sus propios restaurantes.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El tiránico Chef Gordon Ramsay regresa por tercer verano para enseñar y torturar a posibles Chefs. El ganador recibirá un trabajo de Chef en el resort Green Valley Ranch de Nevada.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los dos equipos se enfrentan en un desafío de preparación de alimentos que recompensa a los ganadores por la oportunidad de pasar tiempo con el Chef Ramsay fuera de la cocina.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: El Chef Ramsay ordena a los concursantes restantes que preparen el desayuno para los miembros del servicio visitantes. El equipo ganador tendrá tiempo libre y los perdedores tendrán el rol de patrullar la cocina.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: En el cuarto día, los Chefs restantes compiten en una prueba de degustación con los ojos vendados. Los perdedores deben aceptar un castigo difícil mientras los ganadores cenan con el Chef Ramsay.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Para avanzar en este desafío, los siete Chefs restantes deben comprar y preparar la comida para la recepción de una boda.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Melissa se une a los hombres en una competencia para ver qué equipo puede preparar los mejores platos de langosta. Pero hay un problema: los equipos deben matar primero a sus crustáceos.

programme.title: Hell’s Kitchen en español
programme.desc: Los seis concursantes restantes deben preparar aperitivos y platos principales con las sobras, por lo que ambos equipos deben crear sus propios menús de cena.

programme.desc: Larry is suspicious when Balki claims to have met Olympian Carl Lewis.

programme.desc: Balki wants to play the lottery, but Larry warns him it's not worth it.

programme.desc: Despúes de una ardua búsqueda el Noruego encuentra a su padre, mientras que Jonathan ayuda a Peluzín a llevar una vida de bien.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego decide recuperar a su antigua mascota tlacuache llamada Chofri, mientras que el Abuelo atraviesa por un lapso de demencia senil y depende de Gaspar salvarlo.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Un extraño bebé aparece en la puerta de LFDB, quien viene acarreando una ola de destrucción. Ahora la salvación del mundo depende de la Familia del Barrio.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo consigue una ocupación donde se siente como pez en el agua, mientras que Peluzín entra en un proyecto experimental que le traerá muchos problemas a todos.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Gaspar encuentra por fin el amor de manera inesperada mientras que el Pasita, triste por las limitaciones de su edad avanzada consigue la receta para la eterna juventud.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Frustrado por su trabajo, Gaspar busca apoyo en el Abuelo y el Noruego y termina accidentado. Mientras, gracias a la medicina experimental, Peluzín se convierte en el Dr Lambretón.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Pelu el Payaso le pide a Jony que sea su nuevo ayudante e inician una gira espectacular que da muchos frutos. Mientras tanto, el Noruego descubre su afición por los tatuajes.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Peluzín adquiere una nueva mascota que revolucionará el vecindario. En tanto el Noruego y Gaspar intentan ayudar a el Lentejas a superar sus extrañas inclinaciones sexuales.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo y el Noruego buscan nuevos horizontes a través de la creación de una fundación, mientras Peluzín cae en la cuenta de su soledad y sale a buscar amigos.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego aprende inglés y se prepara para vivir el sueño americano. En tanto, el Abuelo llega a un reencuentro con sus ex-compañeros de colegio y descubre una verdad sepultada por el tiempo.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Peluzín tiene éxito con un nuevo método de protesta, mientras El Noruego y Jony dan sus primeros pasos en la "cossa nostra

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: La Familia abre un grupo de WhatsApp para estar más conectados pero este se sale de control, mientras que Peluzín aprrovecha una noticia de un asesinato para sacarle dinero a Pitipú.

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego milagrosamente logra que le den un crédito bancario, mientras que Peluzín se aprovecha de una muerte reciente dentro del edificio para su beneficio económico.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Noruego emprende en un nuevo negocio con pulgas, mientras que el Abuelo y Jonathan son tomados como rehenes por unos crimínales en un asalto al banco.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: Jonathan y Gaspar buscan darle una lección al Abuelo en en Día del Padre, mientras que el Noruego se siente que no es valorado por Olaf y junto con Peluzín deciden tomar cartas en el asunto.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: El Abuelo se topa un con Genio quien le conceda varios deseos, mientras que el Noruego decide lanzarle una fiesta sorpresa de cumpleaños a Olaf para que recupere su infancia perdida.

programme.title: La familia del barrio
programme.desc: La compañía donde trabaja Gaspar atraviesa un recorte de personal pero el es de los pocos afortunados que se salva y es mandado a una capacitación a Estados Unidos, mientras que Peluzín toma el papel de Gaspar en México.

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: La familia del barrio

programme.title: Hotspots

programme.title: Hot life in Africa

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: The arachnids are endlessly surprising creatures that together form a hugely diverse group of gifted predators replete with mysterious marvels, armed with amazing weapons and possessing almost inexplicable powers.

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: Genets, and their relatives the mustelids, like weasels and raccoons, are armed with disproportionate ferocity for such relatively small animals, capable of hunting in almost all terrestrial ecosystems.

programme.title: Wild Hunters
programme.desc: In the world of hunters, ferocity does not necessarily equate to size; it's often just the reverse and the smaller hunter is the braver and more fearless.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: The blonde manes of golden snub-nose monkeys; pink flamingo feathers brought on by an all-crustacean diet; the markings of gemsboks and cheetahs.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: A gorilla wrestling match, pushy moose antlers, long pelican bills that snap at any enemy within range, and a megashark's stereo sniffer.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Sea lions throw their weight around to win a mate, Cape buffalo deliver knockout punches, Canada geese hit hard with their wings, and lionesses rule the Savanna with an iron paw.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Warthogs' lumpy armor, giant African bullfrogs' jumping and biting skills, wild turkeys' sharp beaks and razorlike spurs, and Nile crocodiles' powerful jaws.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: A glacial stroll alongside a Galápagos tortoise; dancing with venomous European adders; a battle between Lacerta lizards; leopard seals' stealth attacks.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Chatty capuchin monkeys; Eurasian river otters' chilling screams; fruit bats' loud complaints; orcas' human-scale speech systems.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Shadowlands
programme.desc: The south-eastern coast of New Zealand is the place for young marine animals to transition from novices to independent adults; young whales, dolphins and seals learn to hunt, learn the rules of society, or strike out on their own adventures.

programme.title: Extreme Snakes
programme.desc: Takes a look at Africa's various snake species that have adapted and evolved to thrive within the vast continent.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Meeting alphas who get by with a little help from their friends; the inescapable gang mentality of mating male dolphins; ant colonies' unique scents; female geladas always get the last word; wolves hunt family-style.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas
programme.desc: Celebrating small but mighty animal warriors armed with sheaves of scary weapons; admiring nutrias' stink bombs; honey badgers' needlelike choppers; black-tailed gulls' razor-sharp beaks; the killer talons on dive-bombing peregrine falcons.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: I want you to find out who killed my husband." Three years ago, someone shot Count Maupassant to death.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: A string of indiscriminate shootings has struck Northern Africa. They're actually a challenge to Lupin from the wealthy Zylberstein.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Peoplelog"--a social media service that uses AI to analyze the incredible amount of data on the internet, allowing you to learn all about a person.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Fujiko has been captured. She's being held at Orig Island, the headquarters of Shake Hands. Lupin and the gang, including Ami, head there to find her.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Papa! Save Lupin!" Ami is reunited with her long-last father. But Enzo is already obsessed with using Peoplelog to save the world.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin III has vanished from the internet. Meanwhile, the man himself is updating Peoplelog with confidential information that begins to throw the world into chaos.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 5 + 50th Anniversary Special
programme.desc: Lupin receives an invitation to join a race by Mr. X. Jigen and Goemon questions Lupin's willingness to join despite knowing it's a trap, but Lupin has his eyes on the Golden Statue rumored to be in a mansion near the race course.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #17: Tactics Of Angels

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd TVSP #19: The Elusiveness of the Fog

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #21: The Last Job
programme.desc: Lupin and his companions have their sights on a Japanese cultural treasure, a priceless Buddha statue. But when a mysterious group of ninja thieves get the jump on them, it might just be the gang's last job!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 1

programme.title: Súper Shore
programme.desc: ¿Seguirán juntos, Igor y Arantxa?, ¿Qué ocurrirá entre Jawy y Elettra?, y cómo será la última noche de los chicos en Madrid? Fiesta, amor, celos y lágrimas estarán presentes en el último capítulo de Súper Shore

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Este episodio de "El precio de la historia" levanta vuelo con una edición original de 1911 de la novela "Peter Pan": ¿la adquirirá Rick o preferirá gastarse sus recursos en un pedazo de metal de una aeronave?

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Rick ve una espada con pistola del siglo XVIII. ¿Le dará al blanco del trato o le saldrá el tiro por la culata? Llega a la escena un retrato del legendario actor de cine y teatro John Barrymore.

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Rick negocia el precio de unos anillos de cuando los 49ers de San Francisco ganaron el Super Bowl. ¿Podrá lograr una buena jugada? Corey y Rick ponen a prueba un fusil de pesca: ¿descubrirán aguas turbias en las características de este artículo?

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Para celebrar el episodio número 500 de la serie El precio de la historia, Rick considera invertir capital en la capital de la nación. Para empezar, quiere adquirir un juego de cucharas de plata creadas por el patriota estadounidense Paul Revere.

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: El futuro pinta bien para Gold & Silver con una pintura de Marc Chagall que le llama la atención a Rick. ¿Obtendrá esta obra maestra o acabará con un trato descolorido? Más tarde, Rick intenta comprar un anillo de la Serie Mundial de los Boston Red Sox.

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Un vendedor llega con un biciclo antiguo que pone a Rick a rodar: ¿decidirá que este trato vale la pena o le dará la vuelta? A Chum le toca el lado filoso del trato en el momento en que le vende una katana japonesa a Dana White, el presidente de la UFC.

programme.title: El extraordinario siglo XX
programme.desc: Después de la Primera Guerra Mundial, los países comenzaron a reinventar y solidificar nuevas identidades culturales, que van desde la forma en que los ciudadanos se vestían, la forma en que compraban y los lugares a los que viajaban.

programme.title: El extraordinario siglo XX
programme.desc: Después de una regresión mundial, la década de 1930 vio un grupo en ascenso de fascistas que comenzaba a dominar el nuevo mundo y amenazaba con arrastrar al mundo de regreso a la guerra.

programme.title: El extraordinario siglo XX
programme.desc: Una década que comenzó con el estallido de la guerra terminaría también con el mejor intento de paz mundial. A pesar de sus horrores, la iconografía de la década estaría ligada para siempre a ella.

programme.title: El extraordinario siglo XX
programme.desc: Con las culturas solidificándose y los identificadores más tarde reconocidos como elementos básicos de la época, la década de 1950 se hizo conocida como el punto de partida de la cultura pop.

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Un vendedor acude a los expertos del empeño para mostrarles un artículo utilizado en la película "Volver al futuro II". Rick se siente pasado de moda cuando llega a él un extraño calendario de 1900 de una empresa de químicos.

programme.title: El precio de la historia
programme.desc: Rick va a Washington D. C. a ver uno de los primeros Jeep, el cual fue fabricado para la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Aprovechando que está en D. C., visita una librería de tomos antiguos para ver un libro de alquimia.

programme.desc: Un vendedor llega con un biciclo antiguo que pone a Rick a rodar: ¿decidirá que este trato vale la pena o le dará la vuelta? A Chum le toca el lado filoso del trato en el momento en que le vende una katana japonesa a Dana White, el presidente de la UFC.

programme.title: El extraordinario siglo XX
programme.desc: Después de la Primera Guerra Mundial, los países comenzaron a reinventar y solidificar nuevas identidades culturales, que van desde la forma en que los ciudadanos se vestían, la forma en que compraban y los lugares a los que viajaban.

programme.title: El extraordinario siglo XX
programme.desc: Después de una regresión mundial, la década de 1930 vio un grupo en ascenso de fascistas que comenzaba a dominar el nuevo mundo y amenazaba con arrastrar al mundo de regreso a la guerra.

programme.title: El extraordinario siglo XX
programme.desc: Una década que comenzó con el estallido de la guerra terminaría también con el mejor intento de paz mundial. A pesar de sus horrores, la iconografía de la década estaría ligada para siempre a ella.

programme.title: Ataque Animal

programme.title: Ataque Animal
programme.desc: Un conservacionista desarmado escapa por poco de las fauces de un león agresivo. Un piloto dormido atrae a una hiena hambrienta y una leona renegada cambia las tornas después de que una cacería de dos días sale mal.

programme.title: Ataque Animal
programme.desc: ¿Qué puede pasar cuando te encuentras con un oso en la naturaleza? Dos excursionistas de Montana son atacados por una osa. Un joven pierde a su madre por un oso negro hambriento de 400 libras; y dos cazadores en Alaska son emboscados por un oso pardo.

programme.title: Ataque Animal
programme.desc: ¿Qué peligro acecha debajo de la superficie del agua?

programme.title: Descubriendo el mundo

programme.title: Descubriendo el mundo

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Tour de un cocinero

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Tour de un cocinero

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: Tour de un cocinero

programme.desc: La nueva piscina de Lincoln resulta demasiado pequeña y él y sus diez hermanas no pueden usarla al mismo tiempo; Lincoln trata de manipular a Lily para que crezca desarrollando la mentalidad que a él le agrada, no como sus otras hermanas.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations
programme.desc: Tony, who has never been to Vienna, digs deeper into its real culture.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations
programme.desc: Tony explores the Ozark culture and its unique and hospitable community.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations
programme.desc: Tony immerses himself in unexplored gastronomical treasures of the Amazon.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations
programme.desc: Tony explores the tough, infamous neighborhood of South Boston.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations
programme.desc: Tony and his crew set out to discover Hokkaido, Japan's wild west frontier.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations
programme.desc: The soul of Cuba is found in a baseball stadium packed with exuberant fans.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations
programme.desc: Tony visits China's Macau, the gambling capital of the world.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations
programme.desc: Tony explores Naples on a quest to define true Italian food and culture.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations
programme.desc: Tony explores the musical culture of the Californian High Desert.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations
programme.desc: Tony and Zamir team up for a trip to the former Soviet Republic of Ukraine.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations
programme.desc: Tony travels into the Kurdish region of Iraq and Turkey.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations
programme.desc: Tony travels to Cajun country and enjoys a mind-bending boucherie.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations
programme.desc: Tony takes an epic journey that ends with meat pies and gunshot wounds.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations
programme.desc: Despite its sad history, Anthony finds Mozambique is full of optimism.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations
programme.desc: Tony joins the band The Black Keys for some serious BBQ in Kansas City.

programme.title: Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations
programme.desc: Tony cruises Croatia's coast in search of The New Riviera.

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Shauna reveals to her fiance that stripping wasn't enough. She also fears that her fiance is not the father of their son! Then, Travis denies that he is the father of Tenisha's kid because he heard that she cheated on him.

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: Melody believes her boyfriend Glenn hired Marra to wash cars in a bikini and sleep with him. Glenn suspects Melody hasn't been faithful too. Plus, Dani isn't sure if her boyfriend Robert slept with her sister.

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show: Steve, Get Him Out!
programme.desc: Kelly’s ex-husband Nikki continues to haunt her. He went to jail for killing her 2 week old son and is now dating her 18 year old daughter! Can Steve get Nikki out of their lives forever?

programme.title: The Steve Wilkos Show
programme.desc: William received a strange voicemail and became convinced that his girlfriend Jo was drugging him and sneaking men into their house to cheat. Plus, Donovan believes Lacara has been cheating, but she says she confessed so the accusations would stop!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Whoever made the saying "you can't have your cake and eat it too" must have been going to the wrong bakery. Our guests are here to get what they want and aren't scared of who they have to run over to get it.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Iris threw her husband, Wayne, out of the house during a fight, but she never expected he would find a new love so soon. She will confront her husband's new lover, Janie, a woman born with no hands and no feet.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: First, Denise caught her boyfriend having sex with her mom! Next, Luana suspects that her friend is sleeping with her boyfriend, Leroy. Then, Josh is not too happy when he finds out how his girlfriend affords all the football equipment for her son!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Tim doesn't know if he wants to be with Desiree, his wife, and mother of his daughter, or Victoria his gorgeous coworker and Mistress. Then, Olivia is here because she's sick and tired of her husband Fred's cheating ways.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Dave says his girlfriend's constant nagging has driven him into the arms of a 72-year-old woman! Next Joe is about to tell his beautiful girlfriend that he had a one-night stand with a shocking person!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Spirited Betty is in love with Greg, a married man, and is here to break up his home and steal him from his wife, Kirsten. Then Christina says her boyfriend, Sean, does everything she wants except he won't stop sleeping with Megan!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: John weighs almost 700 pounds and couldn't be happier. HIs girlfriend Kim goes so far as to make him choose between her and a 10-foot long sandwich! He chooses the sandwich.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Solo has a few things he needs to tell his best friend and girlfriend, Vixen. Next Cheryl caught her boyfriend, Nick, in bed with another woman. Later Lonnie's wife, Kim, is having an affair with their 18-year-old friend.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Guests feel they have been keeping secrets way too long on today's Jerry Springer Show. Taurus comes clean about cheating on his fiancée Raeleen with her best friend and a man.

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Erin's tired of playing house and is ready to tell Eric she's been cheating, and she's moving on! Then Bill's been cheating on his girlfriend for some time and is ready to move on. But wait until she hears he's been sleeping with her step-sister!

programme.title: The Jerry Springer Show
programme.desc: Angelo is here to tell his girlfriend that he's a woman. Next, Mikey brought his girlfriend here to tell her that he's been cheating on her. But she has a surprise of her own. Later Jennifer feels she must tell her lover the truth about her sexuality

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Maury dice: "¡Tú SÍ eres el padre!" ¿Pero son esas las palabras que los presuntos padres nerviosos quieren oír? ¿O "Tú NO eres el padre" pondrá a las madres en shock? ¡Averigua los resultados en el MAURY de hoy!

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: En esta edición especial de The Maury Show, Maury invita a celebridades al escenario para compartir algunas de las imágenes reales más intensas e impactantes jamás grabadas.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Después de meses de rogar y suplicar, Latoya perdonó a Justice por su infidelidad. ¡Pero ahora han vuelto para someterlo a juicio por lo mismo! Después, puede que James sea demasiado bueno para ser verdad…

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: ¡Infieles, infieles y más infieles! El episodio de hoy de MAURY está lleno de drama, asombro y tentación. ¡Estos invitados simplemente no saben controlar sus acciones ante una tentación y se encuentran en un grave problema con sus parejas!

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Waldo se niega a ser el padre del bebé de Chelsea por su piel clara. Después, Kianna encontró fotos de mujeres desnudas en el teléfono de Nick y condones y colonia en su bolso de gimnasio. ¿Qué dirán los resultados del detector de mentiras de Maury?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: ¿Es Cortney el padre de los hijos de Brittany? Según su hermana, Brittany fue infiel con su prometido Clifton. Después, Melissa afirma que su ex-marido no es el padre de sus gemelos y que es Sean! ¿Lo confirmarán los resultados del ADN?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Shenik y Shenequa aparecieron en el programa de Maury el año pasado después de una prueba de ADN. ¿Pero ahora Shenik se acuesta con el novio de su hermana? Además, lo único que se interpone son los resultados de la prueba del detector de mentiras.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Danica, una nueva mamá, recibió 5 correos electrónicos diferentes de 5 mujeres asegurando que se acostaron con su novio, Jimmy, en su casa. Entonces, ¿el novio de Renee preferirá su adicción a su familia?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Dashawn y su mamá afirman que lo de Monica fue una aventura de una sola vez y que él no puede ser el padre de su bebé. Entonces, April quiere averiguar quién es el padre de su bebé. Después, ¿Frederick o Jason es el padre del bebé de Marietta?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Maury está celebrando las fiestas contando cuentos junto a la chimenea. Compartirá las historias de los antiguos invitados que vinieron a hacerse pruebas de paternidad, al detector de mentiras y más. ¡Averigua si estos invitados han sido buenos o malos!

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Después de hacer 5 pruebas de ADN, Rebecca regresa con 2 hombres más para encontrar al padre de su nuevo bebé. Después, Don y su esposa se alegraron al descubrir que su hijo no era el padre del bebé de Jessica, pero ella cree que Don es el padre.

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Don y Amy contrataron a Jessica para cuidar a su hijo, Steven. Años más tarde, Jessica dice que Steven es el padre de su hijo. Además, Marisol ha hecho 16 pruebas de ADN para encontrar al padre de su hijo. ¿La prueba número 17 será la definitiva?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: Charlotte y Tasheun se acercaron por el padre de sus hijos en común, Brandon, en un álbum fotográfico, pero ¿la prueba de ADN lo confirmará? Luego, ¿probará Tanya que su bebé Craig III es el hijo de Craig Jr.?

programme.title: El show de Maury
programme.desc: ¿Probará Katrina, de 25 años, que Christopher, de 50 años, es el padre de su bebé y callará a su nueva novia, Suprina? ¿El padre del bebé de Sarah es Johnny o un hombre casado? Además, Robert niega ser padre de los bebés de dos mujeres.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Rosaura ve a Sonia y comienza a gritar, después choca contra un poste Jimena le dice a Iván que en la vida de ellos hay una realidad que es Adriana y Guillermo. Rosaura recupera el conocimiento.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Patricio amenaza a Silvano con una pistola. Rodrigo llega a casa de Karina. Ella le dice que quiere curarse para mejorar y para quererlo. Luis Mario le cuelga el teléfono a Griselda.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Camelia aconseja a Patricio que encierre a Rosaura en un manicomio. Luis Mario y Maribella se besan y Luis Mario la llama Rosaura. Jimena le dice a Guillermo que prepare todo para el matrimonio.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Teobaldito y Mairita hablan de sus familias cuando llega Rosaura con regalos para la niña, que supone es hermana del niño. Después llega Luis Mario, que viene a traerle merienda a los chicos.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Rosaura le cuenta a su abuela que está intentando recordar que fue lo que hizo con su hija y cuál fue el parque donde estuvo. Guillermo le propone a Jimena que no se casen.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Camelia y Griselda comienzan a llevar a cabo el plan que tienen para volver loca a Rosaura, mientras que Rosaura discute con su abuela por haberle permitido a Luis Mario entrar en su habitación.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Silvano visita a Rosaura en su casa y le exige que se aleje de Patricio para siempre y que juntos traten de ser felices. Rosaura se niega a seguirlo y junto a Claudia le insisten que se marche.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Patricio teme que Rosaura descubra la verdad acerca de Angeliquita, pero Carlos y Sonia tratan de tranquilizarlo. Camelia y Griselda entre tanto se sienten tranquilas.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Luis Mario y Caridad tienen la esperanza que Angeliquita haga un poco feliz a Rosaura, que aún no ha podido recuperar a su hijita, pero Silvano llega para desafiar a Luis Mario.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Panchita riñe a Verdoso por haberle gritado a Eduardo que asesinó a Anselmo y trata de hacerlo callar pero el loro la acusa de haber sido ella quien se lo contó. Caridad se entera de todo.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Mairita corre a buscar a su hermana para contarle que Teobaldito está muy asustado porque su madre está en la casa y él teme que se lo quiera llevar.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Rosaura y Camelia están dentro de la piscina, peleándose. Eduarda le comenta a Luis Mario que sigue enamorada de Patricio y que él debe olvidar a Rosaura y dedicarse a Maribella.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Rosaura ve a Sonia y comienza a gritar, después choca contra un poste Jimena le dice a Iván que en la vida de ellos hay una realidad que es Adriana y Guillermo. Rosaura recupera el conocimiento.

programme.title: Gata Salvaje
programme.desc: Patricio amenaza a Silvano con una pistola. Rodrigo llega a casa de Karina. Ella le dice que quiere curarse para mejorar y para quererlo. Luis Mario le cuelga el teléfono a Griselda.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Zoro's barely breathing, and Admiral Kizaru is ready to stomp him into oblivion. The battered and beaten Straw Hats could certainly use a powerful friend right about now.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: One by one, the mighty paw-print of Bartholomew Kuma makes the Straw Hats disappear until only Luffy remains. To where did his mates vanish? And will he ever see them again?

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Yesterday, the Straw Hats valiantly battled a Warlord of the Sea. Today, Boss Luffy and his friends at the Pinwheel Diner prepare to compete in the Great Portable Shrine Race!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Thriller Company sabotages the race for a sacred treasure, and the displaced Straw Hats must pull an all-nighter to rebuild their shrine and score some ancient gold!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy finds himself stranded and starving on a strange island. The rubber-man's amazing appetite puts his manhood in danger when he devours an array of exotic mushrooms!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: An army of scantily-clad women warriors want to investigate Luffy's family jewels, but the captain of the Straw Hats is more interested in reuniting with his lost mates.

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The women chasing Luffy are loyal subjects of Boa Hancock, the curvaceous Warlord of the Sea. This stone-cold beauty is deadly, and she's about to pick a fight with an entire fleet of marines!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Luffy's search for a seaworthy vessel leads to a "drop-in" on the Snake Princess during the royal bathing hour. The view is world-class, but it might turn the rubber-man to stone!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: Boa Hancock makes Luffy mad when she turns Margaret into a statue. The Snake Princess may have bitten off more than she can chew by challenging the captain of the Straw Hats!

programme.title: One Piece
programme.desc: The Snake Princess pits Luffy's Gum-Gum abilities against the incredible Haki power of her serpentine sisters in a fight to the death. Will Luffy survive long enough to save his statuesque friends?
