programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys
programme.desc: Finally reaching Violet City, Ash’s search for the Gym is halted by a trip to the local Pokémon Academy. Ash does well playing teacher, until one pupil takes off with Pikachu!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys
programme.desc: It’s finally time for Ash’s first Johto League Gym battle, and he’s feeling confident. But Falkner’s Flying-type Pokémon prove to be tough competition! Can Ash take the win—and his first Gym badge?

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys
programme.desc: Back on the road after his first Johto Gym badge win, Ash and the gang find a cute Marill that won’t stop crying! Nothing our heroes try will stop it, and a Team Rocket raid certainly won’t help!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys
programme.desc: Team Rocket’s latest invention is bound to be a hit...until Togepi and its newfound Sentret friend take it out for a spin!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys
programme.desc: Ash hears of a training ground for wild Charizard and decides it's just the place to hone his own Charizard’s strength. But the tough lessons to be learned there will change Ash and Charizard’s friendship forever!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys
programme.desc: Back on the road to the Azalea Gym, our heroes discover a Sunflora festival in a nearby town and meet a Trainer whose Sunflora is too sad to compete. Can Ash and the gang put a smile on its face?

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys
programme.desc: Ash is having a hard time getting his Chikorita to listen to him, and Nurse Joy thinks that it’s due to a bout of jealousy over Ash’s friendship with Pikachu! Can Ash prove how much Chikorita means to him?

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys
programme.desc: Our heroes meet a Trainer whose Hoppip partners can predict the weather. But on the horizon, there are two storms approaching...and one of them goes by the name 'Team Rocket'!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: The Superhero Secret
programme.desc: The legendary superhero Gligarman grows old and is beginning to consider hanging up his cape. When Ash and friends wander into town, they bring with them a challenge that could be his final fight: Team Rocket!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Mild ‘N Wooly
programme.desc: When an unruly herd of Mareep ruin their lunch plans, our heroes decide to help their timid herder in time to compete in a local battle festival.

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Wired For Battle
programme.desc: When the top student at a Pokémon training center loses interest in Pokémon battles, opting to build a comprehensive Pokémon database instead, it’s up to Ash to convince him that battling is not just about probability!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Good ‘Quil Hunting
programme.desc: When Ash finds a Cyndaquil in the wild, he is eager to catch it...but you can bet he’s not the only one!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: A Shadow Of A Drought
programme.desc: Arriving in Azalea Town, Ash carelessly provokes its residents, who adore SlowPoké. And things only look worse as Team Rocket arrives, meaning to snag every last SlowPoké! What can Ash do?

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Going Apricorn
programme.desc: As he promised Professor Oak, Ash delivers the mysterious GS Ball to a renowned Poké Ball expert. But the fruits of his labor are almost spoiled when Team Rocket bursts onto the scene!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Gettin’ The Bugs Out
programme.desc: Ash has finally reached the Azalea Gym, but Cyndaquil isn’t quite fired up enough to take on the Gym Leader. As the battle heats up, Ash has to give his all to take on the powerful Bug-type Pokémon!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: A Farfetch’d Tale
programme.desc: An inexperienced young Trainer has managed to scare off his own Farfetch’d. Our heroes are happy to help him out, but they'll have to find it before Team Rocket does!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Tricks Of The Trade
programme.desc: At an annual Pokémon trading festival, a young Trainer is looking for a good trade for his Wobbuffet. The Team Rocket trio are looking for opportunities as well, but both sets of Trainers get more than they bargain for!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: The Fire-Ing Squad!
programme.desc: An unexpected Pokémon firefighting competition reunites our heroes with some old friends, the Squirtle Squad! But they are in desperate need of some leadership, so Ash and Squirtle rejoin the ranks.

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: No Big Woop!
programme.desc: When they stumble upon a preschool for Wooper and an emergency calls the teacher away, our heroes come to the rescue! But, as always, Team Rocket is around the corner and up to no good…

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Tunnel Vision
programme.desc: On the way to Goldenrod City, our heroes are forced to head through a tunnel guarded by angry Onix. To make it more difficult, Team Rocket, Snubbull, and Jigglypuff drop in for a visit…

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Hour Of Houndour
programme.desc: Following a string of mysterious thefts, our heroes discover some Houndour struggling to survive in the wild. To help these thieving Pokémon mend their ways, Ash and friends will first have to earn their trust.

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: The Totodile Duel
programme.desc: Ash and Misty’s rivalry is reignited when they both try to capture a Totodile at the same time. Unable to see whose Poké Ball actually caught it, they decide a battle is the best way to decide Totodile’s new Trainer.

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Hot Matches
programme.desc: When Ash hears of a virtually unbeatable Trainer nearby, he's itching to take on the challenge. But both Brock’s Vulpix and Ash’s Cyndaquil take a beating from her Skarmory, even with their type advantage! How can Ash defeat it?

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Love, Totodile Style
programme.desc: Ash’s Totodile develops a crush on a passing Azumarill, the star performer of a Pokémon circus. When Team Rocket arrives to steal the show, Azumarill’s heart isn't the only thing Totodile has to win!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Fowl Play
programme.desc: Ash has his sights set on a rare Noctowl with unusual coloring, but this clever Pokémon repeatedly uses Hypnosis to get the better of him! Will Ash be able to catch this Noctowl napping?

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: Forrest Grumps
programme.desc: A surprise attack from a group of Ursaring has our heroes and Team Rocket running for cover. In the chaos, the groups are split up, and the unenthusiastic pairings are forced to work together. But for how long?

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: The Psychic Sidekicks
programme.desc: After seeing a sign in the forest warning them about mischievous Ghost-type Pokémon, our heroes reach a town whose residents use Psychic types to repel them. But soon some spooky news arrives: a giant Gengar is on the loose!

programme.title: Pokemon: The Johto Journeys: The Fortune Hunters
programme.desc: A sudden craze in Pokémon fortune-telling turns out to be a plot to steal Pokémon from local Trainers. But Jessie, James and Meowth aren't behind it this time! Who are these con artists?

programme.title: Pokemon: Johto League Champions
programme.desc: Arriving in Goldenrod City, Ash is ready for his next Gym battle, but the Gym appears to be closed. Their plans delayed, our heroes decide to explore the vibrant city.

programme.title: Pokemon: Johto League Champions
programme.desc: After losing to Whitney at the Goldenrod Gym, Ash is thinking of a rematch with her powerful Miltank. When Whitney suggests a trip to a Miltank dairy, it’s just the chance he's is looking for!

programme.title: Charmed

programme.title: Charmed

programme.desc: In an attempt to stop a demon on a murderous rampage upon his human relatives, Paige casts a spell that inadvertently blocks all death, and it's up to the Charmed Ones to make things right, when the Angel of Death wants the mess cleaned up.

programme.title: Charmed

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's concern that Lurch is overworked leads Gomez to the operating table to assemble a custom-built secondary butler. Lurch lets the robot do all the work and then begins to feel that he isn't needed anymore.

programme.desc: When Uncle Fester incinerates the family's stuffed bear with his flamethrower, Morticia reports the accident to the insurance company. Mr. Henson the head of the company, sends his assistant, Mr. Digby, to handle the case.

programme.desc: When Ophelia laments that she has been jilted, Morticia suggests a career as an alternative to marriage. She tries chemistry first (with explosive results) then turns to operatic singing. Cousin Itt is summoned to coach her to stardom.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: A pair of bank robbers are welcomed as Halloween trick-or-treaters by Morticia and Gomez. The creepy atmosphere of the house, Morticia's smoldering holiday punch, and Lurch's ominous presence impel the crooks to abandon their plans.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: When Lionel Barker, a former suitor of Morticia's, shows up, Gomez is jealous. But he's soon calmed when he learns that Barker is after Mildred, the new maid. The Addamses then discover that Barker is a con man--after Mildred's money, not her love.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Newlyweds move in next door. But the honeymoon loses its tranquility when Uncle Fester enters their house through a tunnel and they flee in terror at the sight of Lurch, Grandmama sharpening her ax, and Morticia and Gomez bathing the octopus.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The family faces a crisis when Wednesday packs her spider and runs away (after being scolded for playing with Uncle Fester's TNT). When they try to file a missing person report, a detective is anxious to retire early due to their story.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Official visitors from an unfriendly nation receive the shock of their lives when they decide to exploit the Addams Family as an average uncultured family. The visitors are shaken up by Morticia's carnivorous plants among other things.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Morticia's cousin, Melancholia, wants to marry Clarence P. Harvey after most of her marital prospects have joined the Foreign Legion. Clarence recoils when Melancholia puts on a campaign to win him, backed by Morticia, Gomez and Clarence's boss.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch becomes a veritable gazelle when he takes dancing lessons at Gomez and Morticia's suggestion after he admits to being a wallflower at social functions. Each member of the Addams Family teaches Lurch a different step.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Grandmama's paintings leave an art critic speechless, so Gomez sends for his friend, Sam Picasso, to teach Grandmama to paint in the abstract. The starving artist ignores Grandmama's and Morticia's work as he eats and paints.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Rockland Cartright III is a beatnik who crashes his motorbike into a tree and recuperates at the Addams house. Each regards the other as an oddity, although the family learns to appreciate certain aspects of Rockland's life.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Mr. Briggs, the postman, is hired by the government to do undercover work in the Addams house. While pretending to be a stamp collector, he investigates rumors that coded radio messages are being sent from the house.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Lurch's tiny fire-eating mother visits and demands that Lurch's employers wait on her boy hand-and-foot after Lurch leads her to believe that it's his house. Lurch revels in the unexpected attention he gets from Morticia and Gomez.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Uncle Fester's electrical output fails abruptly. Should they call a doctor or an electrician to bring Fester back? Morticia prescribes a bowl of porcupine mold, and both she and Gomez agree that long exposure to moon rays would be beneficial.

programme.title: The Addams Family

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Horses

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: At a training center of Canine Companions for Independence, Jack learns how dogs are trained to assist the disabled. From volunteer-raised puppies to graduates of the advanced training program, CCI dogs are something special.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and his family brave the unpredictable weather and visit the beautiful islands of Fiji. A trip to see red-footed boobies quickly turns into a sea snake-infested island expedition.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he enrolls his grandkids in zookeeper training at Arizona's Wildlife World Zoo! From training Sea Lions and bottle-feeding baby animals to encounters with Kangaroos, Lemurs, Warthogs, Ostrich, and more!

programme.desc: Join Jack for some of his favorite moments of heroism, bravery and lunacy, as he counts down his riskiest animal encounters ever. Sharks, alligators, lions and cobras are just a few of the animals joining in on this Wild Countdown.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Snakes Alive
programme.desc: Jack is counting down his scaliest, slitheriest, snakiest safaris ever. From green anacondas and cobras to eastern diamondbacks, puff adders, taipans and more… this Wild Countdown has teeth!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Meet six exotic species and the habitats they call home sweet home. Corals in Curacao, Galapagos marine iguanas, Borneo’s orangutans, Tasmanian devils, mountain gorillas in Rwanda and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack's comin' home to the Columbus Zoo in Ohio where he gives his grandkids a behind-the-scenes tour. Join in as they learn the ins and outs of zookeeping while meeting amazing animals like elephants, a clouded leopard, and a baby koala.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he meets creatures thriving in their tropical island homes, like the Bison of Catalina Island, Flamingos in Curacao, Sea Lions in the Galapagos, along with Bats, Dolphins, and a special island dedicated to Monkeys!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: The lush lands of Lope are home to rare and unique creatures like Forest Elephants, Forest Buffalo, and Red River Hogs. Plus loads of primates, and Jack has a close encounter with a gorilla!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Creepiest Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jack as he counts down ten of his creepiest encounters with venomous vipers, huge tarantulas, bats, bugs and a whole lot more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: The watery world of Dominica, one of the Caribbean's most pristine islands, provides Jack and his daughter Kathaleen with an unforgettable island adventure.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: The Atacama Desert in northern Chile is known as the highest and driest desert in the world. Jack wants to explore it all-from colorful flamingos to rare cats and even a newly discovered species.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he heads back to his old stomping grounds near Knoxville, Tennessee! He takes his family to his old farm, the Knoxville Zoo, and the University of Tennessee for a special visit with Smokey the Dog.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: After an amazing helicopter trip to the remote location, Jack goes behind-the-scenes at a trout hatchery. Then he and Sue exchange practical jokes while fly-fishing along the Sun River.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild

programme.desc: Jungle Jack is heading to Zimbabwe! Just around the corner from majestic Victoria Falls, the folks at Elephant Camp are working to provide a home to orphaned Elephants in need. Jack assists the team in radio collaring a soon-to-be-released female.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he discovers six creatures with supreme senses, like the animal with the most powerful snout, to a creature with razor-sharp eyesight. Crocs, Elephants, Sharks, Bats, Peregrine Falcons and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Meet impressive and iconic species, each representing their home continent, like Asian King Cobras, Australian Kangaroos, African Lions, Antarctica’s Penguins, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is lending a hand to Shamwari's world-renowned veterinarians and anti-poaching unit as they work on the front lines of conservation in South Africa.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack takes flight in Panama in search of Bats, Birds and other Jungle Creatures! Jack discovers how Bats are vital to Earth's pest control, and learns about one of the coolest adaptations in the animal world – echolocation!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Find out the answers to some of nature’s biggest mysteries! Why do gorillas spend so much time in trees, why do male lions have such shaggy manes, why do jellyfish live upside down? You’ve got questions, and Jungle Jack has the answers!

programme.title: The Love Boat

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Wealthy Alaskan Buddy Bowers (Lorne Greene) recruits the services of the ship to take the wedding party from Vancouver, B.C., to Skagway, Alaska, for the nuptial ceremonies for his orphaned granddaughter, Carol (Lisa Hartman).

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: When Doc (Bernie Kopell) gets the flu, he receives private treatment from a gorgeous doctor (Susan Sullivan) who keeps his fever up even when his temperature drops.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A strict IRS auditor (Phyllis Diller) falls for Capt. Stubing (Gavin MacLeod) until she finds something in his file.

programme.title: The Love Boat

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: In a poignant episode, Capt. Stubling (Gavin McLeod) is reunited with his love child, Vicki (Jill Whelan).

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: When Julie (Lauren Tewes) joins the ship's secret all-male club, she is shocked by the initiation rites.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A swinging bachelor (Dack Rambo) gets the shock of his life when the phony story he tells his gorgeous girlfriend (Barbi Benton) turns out to be true.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A college professor (Dick Martin) turns the Love Boat into a laboratory to test the romantic responses of his lovely female student (Char Fontane).

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A tantalizing entertainer (Charo) receives some unwanted advice on love from members of the crew, who don't approve of her marriage plans.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: In a special two-hour presentation, a singer (Donny Osmond) trying to break into show business finds out unexpectedly that his hillbilly family has decided to take the cruise.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Doc (Bernie Kopell) comes down with a bad case of heartache when the beautiful girl (Misty Rowe) he wants to be alone with boards ship with her ever-present sister (Vicki Lawrence).

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A brilliant plain-Jane (Shelley Hack) becomes a fetching glamour gal with the help of Julie (Lauren Tewes), and falls in love with a man (Kevin Tighe) who has some mistaken ideas about her.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Using science as their most powerful weapon, investigators must find these hired killers and make them pay the true price of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Accidental deaths, suicides, disappearances, and fires; they're an everyday part of an insurance investigator's life. But cases shouldn't be taken at face value. Forensics has become a tool for exposing insurance fraud.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Ballistic analysis is the key to finding killers who turn guns on their victims. Each shot fired leaves its own “fingerprint”, allowing scientists to target murderers with deadly aim.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: There's never a good reason for murder, but some killers are particularly brutal—choosing their prey at random or with no apparent motive and then cunningly covering their tracks. Even so, telltale clues remain.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A victim usually never foresees danger when the perpetrator turns out to be a friend or a lover. Science and microscopic evidence can unmask these killers and find justice for those who are Loved To Death.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For serial killers, once is never enough. For investigators, the challenge is steep when the killers murder by numbers.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: There are several things that can suggest murder; jealousy, anger, poison…When everyday substances reveal hidden clues that break a homicide case, those substances become the elements of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: No matter how chaotic or how clean a crime scene appears to be, the culprit is bound to leave something telling behind. Occasionally, it's nothing more than a fingerprint or shoe tread. Sometimes that's all that's needed.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For some killers, murder can be a profitable business. And the scene of the crime can be both a source for clues, and puzzling questions. When a victim has been targeted for death, investigators must look beyond the obvious to uncover a murder for hire.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes when a death seems to be accidental or the result of a tragic accident, it is up to forensic scientists to reveal the deception lying just below the surface.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: When a murder is committed and deceit clouds the evidence, investigators turn to science and technology to uncover the truth and expose a murderous lie and capture the killer.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A woman is found dead at the bottom of the basement stairs. As detectives look into the accident, they begin to question the sequence of events.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The solution to the most heinous crimes often hinge on the smallest of clues. Investigators must have their eyes trained to find the full story of a murder written in a single scrap of evidence.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Some people murder for love. But these killers did it for the money. When greed is the motive, investigators must make every clue pay off.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Assorted enemies pressure Rick and the group; the survivors and the prison may reach a breaking point.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Following his defeat at Woodbury, the Governor wanders aimlessly until he encounters a family in need.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: At the camp outside the prison, the addition of new members threatens the peace; something new unfolds as the Governor plans his next move.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Beth remains hopeful, and she and Daryl search for other survivors of the Governor's attack; the now-divided group faces obstacles in their quest for safety.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl and Beth find shelter while another group has a realization about their own protection; Sasha, Bob and Maggie clash over a search mission.

programme.title: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Los Reapers defienden Meridian del asalto de una horda de zombis. Pope cree que Maggie es la responsable del ataque, y los habitantes de Alexandria tratan de proteger las defensas de la ciudad, destrozadas por una violenta tormenta.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl, Maggie, Gabriel, Negan y Elijah luchan contra los Segadores por comida. Aaron debe sobrevivir a una tormenta.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: El grupo celebra Halloween en el interior de la Mancomunidad. Daryl y Rosita se someten a un entrenamiento militar dirigido por Mercer, mientras Carol investiga el problema de salud de Ezekiel.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Eugene busca a Stephanie, que desapareció misteriosamente. Connie investiga al soldado Davis. Carol ayuda a Lance a investigar una comunidad que está extorsionando a la Mancomunidad por dinero.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Aaron y Maggie se encuentran a la governadora Pamela Milton mientras recorre Alexandria, Oceanside y Hilltop. Ezekiel tiene suerte durante un control de rutina. Eugene procesa la historia de Max.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie, Lydia y Elijah ayudan a un extraño de otra comunidad llamada Riverbend. Se encuentran con Aaron, quien les cuenta sobre una misión en la que se embarcó con Gabriel como emisarios de la Mancomunidad.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie, Lydia y Elijah ayudan a Aaron y a Gabriel en una misión de rescate. En medio del caos, Negan vigila a Hershel. Sebastian fuerza a Daryl y Rosita a realizar un atraco.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Hornsby obliga a Daryl y a sus tropas a enfrentarse contra Maggie en Hilltop. Tras un angustioso atraco, Rosita consigue que Connie, Kelly, Eugene y Max investiguen a los Milton. Ezekiel ayuda a los pacientes del hospital.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Maggie se prepara para defender Hilltop y a los habitantes de Riverbend frente al ataque de Hornsby. Mientras tanto, éste contrata a Leah para que la mate.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl y Negan se introducen en la Mancomunidad para obligar a Hornsby a que deje de perseguir a sus familias. Pamela enfrenta las protestas de aquellos que están hartos de la impunidad de los crímenes de Sebastian.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Carol y Pamela hacen un trato de borrón y cuenta nueva en nombre de sus amigos. Aaron, Jerry, Lydia y Elijah se marchan hacia Oceanside para hablarles de un plan. La Commonwealth celebra el Día de los Fundadores.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Eugene huye después del incidente del Día de los Fundadores. Pamela le pide a Mercer que investigue dónde está, para disgusto de Max y La Princesa. Por otro lado, Aaron, Jerry, Lydia y Elijah se topan con un contratiempo peculiar.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Daryl y Carol investigan el paradero de sus amigos después de que Pamela los hiciera desaparecer de la Commonwealth. Por desgracia, su única pista es Hornsby. Por otro lado, Pamela le pide a Yumiko que procese a Eugene en nombre de la Commonwealth.

programme.title: The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Después de separarse de sus hijos, Maggie, Gabriel y Rosita siguen un convoy militar hasta un destino misterioso. Ezekiel, Kelly, Negan y Annie acaban en una zona de obras. Daryl y Carol siguen a un tren que lleva a Connie a bordo.

programme.title: Mike Tyson vs Henry Tillman

programme.title: Josh Taylor vs Jose Ramirez

programme.title: Mike Tyson vs Lorenzo Canady

programme.title: Luis Alberto Lopez vs Gabe Flores
programme.desc: On September 10th, 2021, Luis Alberto Lopez fought Gabe Flores in a super featherweight bout in Tucson. In a surprising upset, Lopez won by a convincing unanimous decision.

programme.title: Juan Manuel Marquez vs Mike Alvarado
programme.desc: On May 17th, 2014, Juan Manuel Marquez fought Mike Alvarado in a WBO Welterweight Title eliminator at The Forum in Inglewood. Both fighters scored a knockdown in the bout, but it was Marquez that prevailed with a unanimous decision victory.

programme.title: Teofimo Lopez vs William Silva

programme.title: Miguel Cotto vs Muhammad Abdullaev

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: The Autobots participate in a charity road race to watch over an experimental race car - a car made of a special type of material Megatron needs to complete his latest doomsday weapon, a weather-dominating device capable of mass destruction.

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series
programme.desc: Aerialbots Slingshot and Skydive disguise themselves as normal jet fighters to expose a ring of human thieves stealing aircraft. But when they learn that Megatron is behind the scheme, they must combine with the other Aerialbots to convert into Superion!

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series

programme.title: Transformers: Original Series

programme.desc: Stevie thinks he needs to bless the world with a Stevie J. action figure, but Scrappy thinks he needs a serious reality check! Motivated to make his dream of a music lounge come true, Stevie turns to K. Michelle for advice.

programme.title: Leave It To Stevie
programme.desc: Savannah and Stevie Jr. try to manage Dorian's career. Stevie gets a culture shock when he tries to woo a French beauty. At K. Michelle's suggestion, Stevie meets with a PR exec for tips on how to launch his party venture Sleazy J's!

programme.title: Leave It To Stevie
programme.desc: Stevie and Scrappy enter the exciting world of semi-pro Wrestling! Will the duo be able to hold their own against the reigning Tag Team Champs? Meanwhile, two women test Stevie and Safaree with a yoga challenge.

programme.title: Leave It To Stevie
programme.desc: Stevie can't seem to explain his vision for Sleazy J's, so he decides to get his message across with a unique invitation to his first ever pop-up party. Stevie takes it upon himself to find Mr. Right for his daughter, Savannah.

programme.title: Leave It To Stevie
programme.desc: Stevie throws the inaugural Sleazy J party, a star-studded event, and invites a special someone to be his date. Meanwhile, he is forced to put his chef's hat on to make a unicorn cake for Eva's fundraiser.

programme.title: Follow the Rules
programme.desc: Ja Rule gets Punk'd when Brittney brings home a pretend boyfriend to prove she's not a kid anymore. Jeff and Jordy put their lives on the line when Grandma Debra attempts to teach Grandma Jean how to drive.

programme.title: Follow the Rules
programme.desc: When Ja has a concert in NYC, Jeff turns Brittney's low key night with friends into a raging house party. The grannies use Ja's performance as an excuse to go man hunting.

programme.title: Follow the Rules
programme.desc: Jordy goes on his first date with help from Ja and Brittney. After being grounded for slacking off at school, Jeff sneaks out of the house to go to a strip club.

programme.title: Follow the Rules
programme.desc: Ja becomes Mr. Mom and quickly learns that a woman's work is never done. Brittney transforms into 'Bri-yonce' in hopes of finding her Jay-Z at a college costume party.

programme.title: Follow the Rules
programme.desc: Brittney brings her new boyfriend home for Thanksgiving, and Ja gets more information about their relationship than he bargained for. The grannies compete to see who can bake the best pie.

programme.title: Follow the Rules
programme.desc: Brittney, Jeff, and Jordy help Grandma Debra enter the digital dating game when they create an online dating profile. Meanwhile, Ja's attempt to fix Brittney's bathroom quickly goes down the toilet.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: It's summertime at the Simmons House. Rev has just purchased a BMW for Jojo's graduation. Diggy and Russy remind Run that they have made the honor roll at school and wonder if they will get a gift too.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: Believing Diggy's fly wardrobe may have something to do with girls being interested in him, Russy raids Diggy's closet. Hearing the boys argue over clothes, Justine decides to get Russy some clothes of his own.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: Rev and Justine are both fed up with the boys' rude behavior. Justine decides to bring in a supernanny type person to teach the family the basics in social etiquette.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: When Rev learns that Diggy's play date is actually with two girls he believes that Diggy must have a crush on one of them. He's hoping it's Ja Rule's daughter because they must be rich.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: Rev receives guest passes to the Mohegan Sun in Connecticut. Justine doesn't want to go. Rev is proud of Jojo's recent recordings with Blackout and wants to reward him as a fellow rapper.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: Since Rev can't remember the last time Diggy and Russy had a sleepover, he requests that they invite their friends over for an unforgettable sleepover that Rev dubs "Camp Rev.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: While putting together her latest insert of Angela's Rundown, Angela discovers she has way too much content to fit into one sixteen-page insert. She and her crew at work discuss a full magazine.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: When Rev hears that his good friend Kid Rock is coming into town he invites him to stay at the house. Russy hopes that Kid will teach him how to play his guitar.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: Justine is babysitting her sister Michelle's eleven-month-old baby, Ameera, for two nights. The boys look forward to helping their mom babysit as long as they don't have to change diapers.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: With their tracks finally mixed and mastered JoJo, Zach and Reggie, aka "Blackout," are ready to hit the streets and find a record deal.

programme.title: Run's House
programme.desc: To keep occupied while going to an engineer tech school in the city, JoJo begins an internship at Phat Farm to learn the family business.

programme.title: Shaunie's Home Court
programme.desc: Myles no longer appreciates his living situation and yearns to move out. When Keyonna feels as though she's being taken for granted by being forced to work on her day off, Shaunie finds herself not only teaching a lesson, but learning one as well.

programme.title: Shaunie's Home Court
programme.desc: When Shaqir plans his 13th birthday party, Myles and Keyonna take this as a green light to go crazy. Mimi wants to makeover her sister, Me'Arah, into a mini version of herself. Shaunie realizes if she wants something done right, she must do it herself.

programme.title: Shaunie's Home Court
programme.desc: When Myles gets ready to move to New York for a summer internship, Shaunie struggles with letting go of her firstborn. When Dear enlists them to make the goodbye dessert it turns into a family bakeoff, which is simply a recipe for disaster.

programme.title: Shaunie's Home Court
programme.desc: Shaunie's excited that Shareef is finally ready to get his driver's license. Shaqir can't resist temptation when Shaunie gives him a budget for school clothes.

programme.title: Shaunie's Home Court
programme.desc: Shaqir gets a tutor to prepare for a big test, but the tutor is so cute Myles and Shaqir can't stop fighting for her attention. Shaunie figures out a way to get Myles to spend more time at his new apartment and less time at her place.

programme.title: Shaunie's Home Court
programme.desc: Shaunie tells Shareef he can get a tattoo, but then she can't stand the tattoo design he wants to get. Myles needs to learn how to walk the runway before he heads to Italy for his first big job as a fashion model.

programme.title: Shaunie's Home Court
programme.desc: Keyonna has a temp nanny help the family while she's on vacation, but Shaunie likes the new nanny so much she might be taking over. Grandma Dear isn't happy with the birthday party Shareef and Myles throw her.

programme.title: Hollywood Exes
programme.desc: Mayte and Jessica attempt to repair their damaged relationship. Meanwhile, Sheree pitches her skin product, Whoop-Ash, to a trendy Hollywood boutique and Nicole prepares a public showing of her new clothing line.

programme.title: Hollywood Exes
programme.desc: In this dramatic season finale, the ladies rehearse a number for Andrea's upcoming dance benefit, during which one of them has a serious and painful accident. With less than an hour before showtime, an ambulance is called...

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: Malaysia refuses to stand for Jackie's underhanded comments and kicks her out of her party. Shaunie invites the girls to her son's clothing line launch and hopes to bring some resolve to the group now that Draya is gone. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: Angel attempts to defend her character but is quickly put in the hot seat when Malaysia and Mehgan come for her. Jackie and Malaysia grow sick of their differences and try to use this vacation to finally mend fences. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: Mehgan finally pushes Angel to her breaking point and a second beach brawl ignites when Brandi and Malaysia confront the Miami ladies, Tami and Shaunie, because of some assumed giggling. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: In the Basketball Wives LA Season 4 Reunion Special, Mehgan shocks the ladies with something she found online and tensions between Tami and Brandi explode over talk of Draya. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Hollywood Exes
programme.desc: Hollywood Exes welcome a new member, Shanna Moakler, to the sisterhood as they gather for a brunch at Nicole's house. Drea arrives with an unexpected surprise but the event turns sour when Mayte suddenly erupts and storms out.

programme.title: Hollywood Exes
programme.desc: Drea brings the women together for dinner in hopes that Mayte and Nicole can bury the hatchet. Unfortunately, a stubborn Mayte digs in her heels and offends both Sheree and Drea in the process.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: Malaysia meets Jackie to discuss their issues. Shaunie O'Neal joins the group and learns of the heavy drama. Draya has critical thoughts on Mehgan's performance in Jackie's commercial, which Mehgan hears at the commercial premiere. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Basketball Wives LA
programme.desc: It's time for a weekend away in Santa Barbara and at a pre-party lunch, Jackie lets loose with every drink she can get her hands on. Draya gets the side eye when she introduces her "real" friend, Angel, to the group. Presented by VH1.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five concentrate their attack on Joey so that Yugi would be forced to duel all alone! Outmanned and overpowered, Yugi and Joey are near the end of the line!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Big Five summon an almighty dragon that previously defeated Joey, Mai, and Mokuba! Joey and Yugi pull out all the stops, but is that enough to avoid their minds being scattered over virtual reality?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a duel for control of KaibaCorp when Noah squares off against Kaiba! But can Kaiba fight at full strength after he learns the hidden truth about Noah... and the tragic past that made him what he is today?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Noah's Shinato's Ark steals monsters into its keep to use as an impenetrable wall of servants! How can Kaiba hurt Noah when Noah has an endless stream of monsters to protect himself with?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's about to finish Noah, but Mokuba protects Noah from his final blow! Will Kaiba sacrifice his beloved brother in exchange for freedom, or will the brotherly bond remain unbreakable?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: For every turn that passes, one of Yugi's friends is transformed into stone! As more and more of his friends harden into solid rock, can Yugi defeat Noah before he runs out of turns and transforms into stone himself?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are petrified into solid stone statues, but their spirits live on! Their combined souls energize Yugi into a noble fight, but is spirit going to win the duel when Yugi's not drawing the right cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi has defeated Noah... but they still can't escape from the virtual world! The real reason behind their entrapment is revealed... as is the true villain pulling the strings!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Kaiba squares off against his stepfather Gozaburo for their final battle, Yugi and friends are attacked by endless hordes of monsters! Their only hope is Noah, but they can't expect help from their enemy... can they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Time is almost up before the missile's explosion destroys Yugi and friends! Will the Battle City finalists beat the clock and live to duel another day in the stunning conclusion to the virtual world saga!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends arrive at KaibaCorp Island where the Battle City finalists will compete in the ultimate dueling arena! Get ready for the awesome four-person battle royal where any duelist can attack anyone else!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Honor, friendship, revenge... As each duelist remembers what they're fighting for, the battle royal rages on where none of the duelists know where the next attack is going to come from!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey may have fought some of the fiercest fights in Battle City, but has all his training taught him to become an elite duelist? Joey's gonna show what he's made of in the conclusion to the four-man battle royal!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik ensnares Joey in a Shadow Game where each duelist's heart is linked with his monsters... literally! Every time a monster received damage, the duelist feels the pain instead!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik's Helpoemer send Joey's powerful cards to the graveyard before Joey can use them! Running low on cards and life points, Joey's opportunities for staging a comeback are nearly depleted!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey thinks this duel can't turn any worse... but Marik has all the pieces necessary to summon The Winged Dragon of Ra! Can Joey prevent Marik from summoning the Egyptian God Card, or is victory simply not in the cards?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Marik transforms The Winged Dragon of Ra into its powerful form, the Egyptian God Phoenix! If Joey can't withstand the Phoenix's blazing fire, he'll lose the duel... plus his only chance to save Mai from her mental prison!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the rematch we've all been waiting for! Yugi and Kaiba square off for the first time since Duelist Kingdom in front of thousands of ravenous fans for the right to challenge Marik! It's time to duel!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba has all the monsters necessary to summon Obelisk the Tormentor to finish Yugi off! Though overwhelmed and outmatched, nothing is going to stop Yugi from trying to summon his Egyptian God first!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon clashes against Kaiba's Obelisk the Tormentor, what will happen when two Egyptian Gods fight each other? It's time to find out which Egyptian God is truly stronger!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The clash of the two Egyptian God Monsters releases mystical energies that show Yugi and Kaiba visions of the ancient Egyptian past! What new answers do these images unlock, and what prophecies do they make for the future?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba summons three powerful Blue-Eyes White Dragons, but Yugi has no monsters remaining in his deck! Is losing only a matter of time, or will a long-dormant card from a fallen friend help turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba not only controls Blue-Eyes Ultimate Dragon, but his Final Attack Orders card leaves Yugi with only three cards in his deck! If Yugi loses, he'll have to give up his chance to save the world from Marik's evil!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Tired of Kaiba's insults, Joey challenges Kaiba for third place in the Battle City Tournament! Has Joey mastered enough strategies to take down the top dog, or is Kaiba going to wallop Joey like a pathetic puppy?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba attacks with his mighty Blue-Eyes White Dragon, but Joey has no monsters to defend with! Joey's luck has run out, so it's time for him to rely on skill!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey and Kaiba's battle reaches its roaring climax! Will Joey take down his biggest headache and actually teach Kaiba a thing or two about being a true duelist?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
